title: The Story Is Not Over Yet - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Contracts   Divorce   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Nobles   R-18   Revenge
author: 정으뜸
description:
The end of my story, which I thought was a happy ending, was ruined.

“Let’s get divorce, us.”

My husband, who fell in love with a woman other than me, trampled on me miserably.

In front of me who crumbled and chose death,
A devil with sparkling purple eyes, Duke Perial appeared.

“Will you sign a contract with me? I’ll give you anything you want, anything.”
“Who are you?”
“I’m the devil.”

Red lips smiling, he spit out a sweet whisper like the ‘devil’.

“Instead, I’m going to come over the window like this at every certain time to covet your night. That’s the condition of our contract.”

If I could trample the lives of those who made me this way
It’s nothing to sell all my body and soul to the devil.

“The red mark engraved on that body is proof that you’re ‘mine’.”>
